author: Shawna Chen
title: Lawmakers urge Biden to get congressional approval before sending troops to Ukraine
description: The signatories ranged from Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) to Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.)
content:
Forty-three members Congress, both Republicans and Democrats, are urging President Biden to get authorization from Congress before deploying any U.S. Armed Forces to Ukraine.
